text.name: Crimson Strike
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ types of negative effects, Clash Power +1
[WinDuel] Gain 1 [Breath] and +1 [Breath] Count

text.name: Crimson Strike
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ types of negative effects, Clash Power +1
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 3+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Gain 2 [Breath] and +1 [Breath] Count

text.name: Crimson Strike
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ types of negative effects, Clash Power +1
[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 3 [Burst] on target (max 2)
[WinDuel] Gain <style="highlight">3 [Breath] and +<style="highlight">2 [Breath] Count
coinDescs: [CriticalOnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn (<style="highlight">2 times per turn)

text.name: Crimson Phoenix
text.desc: [WhenUse] If target has 5+ types of negative effects, Coin Power +1
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Gain [Breath] Count equal to [Burst] Count on target (max 3)
Deal +(20 + [Breath] on self + [Burst] on target)% damage on Critical Hit (max 50%)

text.name: Crimson Phoenix
text.desc: [WhenUse] If target has 5+ types of negative effects, Coin Power +1
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Gain [Breath] Count equal to [Burst] Count on target (max 3)
Deal +(20 + [Breath] on self + [Burst] on target)% damage on Critical Hit (max 50%)

text.name: Crimson Phoenix
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ types of negative effects, Coin Power +1
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 4+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Gain [Breath] Count equal to [Burst] Count on target (max 3)
Deal +(20 + [Breath] on self + [Burst] on target)% damage on Critical Hit (max 50%)

text.name: Crimson Spring
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] If main target has 6+ types of negative effects, Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] Coin Power +2 for every 3 types of negative effect on main target (max 4)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 7 (sum of [Burst] + [Burst] Count on main target) (max 3)
[WinDuel] Gain 4 [Breath]
coinDescs: Deal +(20 + [Breath] on self + [Burst] on main target)% damage (max 40%)
Deal +(45 + [Breath] on self + [Burst] on main target)% damage on Critical Hit (max 65%)
+5% Damage on Critical Hit for every [StartXichun] on self (max 30%)

text.name: Crimson Spring
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] If main target has 5+ types of negative effects, Atk Weight +1
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] At 3+ [StartXichun], Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] Coin Power +2 for every 3 types of negative effect on main target (max <style="highlight">6)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 7 (sum of [Burst] + [Burst] Count on main target) (max <style="highlight">5)
[WinDuel] Gain 4 [Breath]
coinDescs: Deal +(<style="highlight">50 + [Breath] on self + [Burst] on main target)% damage (max <style="highlight">75%)
Deal +(<style="highlight">80 + [Breath] on self + [Burst] on main target)% damage on Critical Hit (max <style="highlight">105%)
+5% Damage on Critical Hit for every [StartXichun] on self (max 30%)<style="highlight">

text.name: Crimson Strike - Launcher [始]
text.desc:
[CantDuel]
[BeforeAttack] Consume all [WaitingXichun] on self to gain +([WaitingXichun] on self x 2) Atk Weight (max 5)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count

text.name: Crimson Strike - Launcher [始]
text.desc:
[CantDuel]
[BeforeAttack] Consume all [WaitingXichun] on self to gain +([WaitingXichun] on self x 2) Atk Weight (max 5)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] At 3+ [WaitingXichun], Coin Power +1

text.name: Crimson Strike - Launcher [始]
text.desc:
[CantDuel]
[BeforeAttack] Consume all [WaitingXichun] on self to gain +([WaitingXichun] on self x 2) Atk Weight (max 5)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count
[WhenUse] At 3+ [WaitingXichun], Coin Power +<style="highlight">2

text.name: Adept Evasion
text.desc:
[StartBattle] At 3+ [StartXichun], perform a [RetreatForCommon] at Turn End.
- Upon Retreat, move to the frontmost place in the Backup units' Deployment order (Returns first before the other Backup units Substitute in)
[OnSucceedEvade] Gain 2 [Breath] (2 times per turn)

text.name: Adept Evasion
text.desc:
[StartBattle] At 3+ [StartXichun], perform a [RetreatForCommon] at Turn End.
- Upon Retreat, move to the frontmost place in the Backup units' Deployment order (Returns first before the other Backup units Substitute in)
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Gain +1 [Breath] Count (2 times per turn)
[OnSucceedEvade] Gain 2 [Breath] (2 times per turn)

1081201.name: Rupture-breathing Resolve [破吸自桓]
1081201.desc:
When killing the target with this unit's Attack Skills, gain [Breath] equal to [Burst] on target (3 per 1 enemy; once per turn)
- If this unit gained 3 [Breath] with the above effect, gain [Breath] Count equal to [Burst] Count on target (2 per 1 enemy; once per turn)

In a Clash, if this unit's Offense Level is higher than the target's, Clash Power +1

In a Clash, if this unit's Offense Level is higher than the target's, inflict +1 more [Burst] Potency or [Burst] Count with this unit's Base Attack Skills (2 times per turn)

1081202.name: Launching Maneuver [始動]
1081202.desc:
Upon Retreat: apply 1 Offense Level Up next turn to allies in their Deployment order
- Number of affected allies = [StartXichun] Stack on self
- If the affected ally is a "Jia Family" unit, apply 2 Offense Level Up next turn instead
- Does not affect allies that either Return or Substitute next turn

On the turn this unit Substituted or Returned to the field, gain [WaitingXichun]; then, at Combat Start, as the very first Skill in the Skill order, use 'Crimson Strike - Launcher【始】' against a random target.

1081221.name: Lingering Resolve [餘桓]
1081221.desc:
If this unit is defeated in an Encounter, apply [CheerUpXichun] to the subsequently Substituting Identity (the fastest Backup Unit in the Deployment Order) next turn

In Chain Battles, if this unit is a Backup unit or has Retreated, activate the following:
- Combat Start: Among the Identities who 1) are at 50% HP or lower, and 2) used a Defense Skill, choose the Identity with the earliest Deployment order. At Turn End, that Identity recovers from Stagger caused by damage and performs a [RetreatForCommon] (2 times per Encounter)
